attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That all M.P.'s use pulic transport when dealing with tax payers and constituancy business,I.E.buses,trains,underground trains,exept for cabinate ministers,who would be allowed to fly no more than 6 times per year at taxpayers expence. This would allow all members of parliment to have first hand knowledge of the state of the countries infrastructure,and by making sure they use it at all times only then can the public expect them to make the improvements required of them.

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
